Low MOQ Clothing Manufacturer Bangladesh: Start Your Brand with Just 50 Pieces

OEKO-TEX & BSCI certified factory. 50-piece minimum order. 15-20 day production. Perfect for fashion startups, DTC brands, and Amazon FBA sellers.

üì¶MOQ: 50 pieces

Starting a clothing brand shouldn't require thousands of pieces and tens of thousands of dollars. At Sleek Apparels, we specialize in low minimum order quantity (MOQ) manufacturing with just 50 pieces per style per color ‚Äî making us the ideal partner for fashion startups, DTC brands, and small businesses testing new markets.

As an OEKO-TEX Standard 100 and BSCI certified clothing manufacturer in Bangladesh, we combine ethical production practices with flexible MOQs and fast turnaround times. Whether you're launching a sustainable streetwear brand on Shopify, sourcing private label apparel for Amazon FBA, or creating custom uniforms for your team, we have the capability and experience to bring your vision to life.

Unlike traditional Bangladesh clothing factories that require 500-1,000 piece minimums, we've built our business model around serving emerging brands and entrepreneurs who need production flexibility. This allows you to test designs, validate markets, and scale gradually without massive inventory risk or cash flow strain.

Why Choose Sleek Apparels as Your Low MOQ Clothing Manufacturer?

‚úÖ

True 50-Piece MOQ (Not 500 Disguised)

Most Bangladesh factories claim "low MOQ" but require 500-1,000 pieces. We accept genuine 50-piece orders, letting you test markets without massive inventory risk. Perfect for startups validating product-market fit.

üõ°Ô∏è

OEKO-TEX & BSCI Certified

OEKO-TEX Standard 100 ensures no harmful chemicals. BSCI certification guarantees ethical working conditions, fair wages, and safe factories. Perfect for conscious brands targeting USA and EU markets.

‚ö°

Fast 15-20 Day Production

Quick turnaround for small orders. Samples in 5-7 days, bulk production in 15-20 days. Rush orders available with 10-12 day timeline. Dedicated production lines for low MOQ orders ensure no delays.

üìà

Size Split Flexibility

Split 50 pieces across XS-XXL sizes. Example: 5 XS, 10 S, 15 M, 15 L, 5 XL = 50 total. Match your customer demographics without overstock or stock-outs. Data-driven size allocation guidance available.

üë•

Startup-Friendly Support

Tech pack development, fabric sourcing guidance, quality control support, and shipping coordination. We understand startups need more than just manufacturing ‚Äî we're your production partner.

üåç

USA Export Expertise

Experience with USA customs, shipping documentation, and compliance. Amazon FBA prep services available (poly bagging, labeling, FNSKU). Direct shipping to USA fulfillment centers or your warehouse.

‚öôÔ∏è

Full Customization Options

Screen printing, embroidery, sublimation, heat transfer, woven labels, hang tags, custom packaging. Your brand, your way. Design support available for branding elements and packaging.

üí∞

Transparent Pricing

No hidden fees. Prices include fabric, labor, quality control, and basic packaging. Payment terms: 30% deposit, 70% before shipping. Volume discounts for 200+ pieces (5-15% savings).

Our 7-Step Manufacturing Process

Step 1

Design Consultation

Share your vision, sketches, or tech packs. We review feasibility, suggest fabrics, estimate costs.

Step 2

Sample Development

5-7 days to produce physical samples. Revisions included. Approve fit, fabric, and branding.

Step 3

Order Confirmation

30% deposit to begin bulk production. Detailed spec sheet and timeline provided.

Step 4

Fabric Sourcing

We source certified fabrics from trusted mills. OEKO-TEX tested for safety compliance.

Step 5

Production (15-20 days)

Cutting, sewing, quality checks at multiple stages. Daily production updates available.

Step 6

Quality Control

AQL 2.5 inspection standard. Each piece checked for stitching, print quality, measurements.

Step 7

Shipping & Delivery

Air freight (7-10 days) or sea (18-25 days). Track shipment from factory to your door.

Transparent Pricing (No Hidden Fees)

All prices FOB Chittagong. Includes fabric, labor, quality control, and basic packaging. Volume discounts available for 200+ pieces.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is your absolute minimum order quantity?

Our true minimum order is 50 pieces per style per color. Unlike many factories that claim "low MOQ" but require 500+ pieces, we genuinely accept orders as small as 50 units. This allows fashion startups and DTC brands to test markets without massive inventory risk.

Can I split 50 pieces across different sizes?

Yes! You can split your 50-piece minimum across standard sizes (XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL). For example, 5 XS, 10 S, 15 M, 15 L, 5 XL = 50 total pieces. This flexibility helps you match customer demand patterns.

How much do samples cost and how long do they take?

Sample costs range from $25-50 per piece depending on complexity. We produce samples in 5-7 days including shipping time. Once approved, bulk production takes 15-20 days for orders of 50-500 pieces.

What's the price range for 50-piece orders?

Pricing depends on product complexity and fabric. Basic t-shirts: $3.50-$5.00/piece, Premium t-shirts: $5.00-$7.00/piece, Hoodies: $12.00-$18.00/piece, Activewear: $8.00-$14.00/piece. These prices include fabric, labor, printing/embroidery, and packaging (FOB Chittagong).

Do you accept multi-color orders at 50-piece MOQ?

Yes, but the 50-piece minimum applies per style per color. So if you want 2 colors, that's 50 pieces x 2 = 100 total. However, for established clients, we offer some flexibility on color minimums after the first order.

What certifications do you have?

We are OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified (textile safety), BSCI certified (ethical production), and WRAP certified (social compliance). All certifications are current and can be verified. We also comply with USA import requirements.

Can you help with tech pack development?

Yes! We offer tech pack development support for startups. If you have sketches or ideas but no professional tech packs, our design team can help create detailed specifications. This service costs $50-150 per design depending on complexity.

Do you ship directly to USA and handle Amazon FBA prep?

Absolutely! We ship to USA via air freight (7-10 days) or sea freight (18-25 days). We offer Amazon FBA prep services including poly bagging, labeling with FNSKU barcodes, and carton requirements. FBA prep adds $0.50-1.00 per unit.

What's your production capacity for small orders?

We have dedicated production lines for small-batch orders (50-500 pieces). Our facility produces 50,000-80,000 pieces monthly, but we allocate 20% capacity specifically for startup and small brands. This ensures fast turnaround without quality compromise.

Can I visit your factory before placing an order?

Yes, factory visits are welcome! We're located in Uttara, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Many clients visit during the sampling phase. We can also arrange video factory tours via WhatsApp or Zoom if you prefer to see operations before traveling.
